recipes.label: Rush A Ritual for Quick Power
recipes.startdescription: If I bring the right trappings to a place with the right ambiance, I could perform a ritual to give myself great power. The actions I'd take might be...peculiar, and raise the suspicion of the general public.

recipes.label: Perform a covert Forge Ritual in an Industrious Space
recipes.startdescription: I have brought my implements, and the atmosphere is charged and ready.

recipes.label: Perform a covert Forge Ritual in an Industrious Space
recipes.startdescription: What I have brought is only part of the ritual. Below the iron and the ash, I need to bury an object fresh from the forge.
recipes.description: Music brightens, Influence blossoms. An errant raindrop sizzles on my skin. I take care not to touch strangers, for fear their flesh will blister.
